biotools.summary: A comparative platform on grapevine and tomato reporting paralog and related ortholog genes identified with an analytical, dedicated, procedure. It provides an update on functional annotations from the two species and it represents an internationally unique platform. It is in expansion in order to include other species, useful to study fruit development.

bioschemas.name: ComParaLogS
